posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
There are areas in my server that have areas for levels 29 and under.  Was wondering if anybody had any good
​ideas for a 29th level build that had elemental shifting abilities and or other shifting abilities too

​David

posts.author: HipRedux
posts.content:
For just elemental shapes, go with a high druid build.  For shapes that use weapons, go shifter with 5-8 levels of druid.  Both will benefit from some monk.

Elemental shapes (just like all shapes that are limited to using creature attacks) only merge armor, shield, hat.  The most DR they can penetrate is +3 unless pre-buffed with Stoneskin or equivalent DR spell effect.  You'll need at least Dru 20 to gain access to elder elemental shapes (the +3 DR ones).

Weapon-using shapes merge every slot except gloves.  The amount of DR that can be penetrated is only limited by the enhancement of the weapon before merging or the shapes' default weapon, whichever is highest.

Epic shifter shapes generally require a substantial WIS investment, but not all of them like Undead shape. Druid's elemental shapes only require enough WIS for the unmorphed druid to cast spells.
